word_mean: 功能的，机能的：关于功能的
官能性的，机能性的：仅影响功能而不影响结构的
查不出器质性原因的。同idiopathic

sentence.Network_en: Felicity's bedroom was spartan but functional.
sentence.Network_cn: 费莉西蒂的卧室很简朴，但非常实用。

sentence.Network_en: The mirror is functional yet decorative.
sentence.Network_cn: 这镜子能照人，但也有装饰作用。

...s，还使用了相关的“目标(aim)“、“目的(purpose)“、“意图(intention)“和“功能(function)“等词。为了避免概念混淆，提议对意图和功能作基本的区分：“意图“是从发送者的角度定义的，而“功能“指.

entry.tran: 实用的;为实用而设计的
entry.def: Functional things are useful rather than decorative.

entry.tran: 工作(或运转)方式的;功能性的
entry.def: Functional means relating to the way in which something works or operates, or relating to how useful it is.

example.ex: ...rules defining the territorial boundaries and functional limits of the local state.
example.tran: 划定本州地界并明确政府职权的章程

entry.tran: 在工作的;在起作用的;运转正常的
entry.def: Functional equipment works or operates in the way that it is supposed to.

example.ex: We have fully functional smoke alarms on all staircases.
example.tran: 我们在各层楼梯都安装有完全可用的烟雾警报器。

means.word_mean: 1. designed for or capable of a particular function or use;

sentences.sentence: "a style of writing in which every word is functional"

means.word_mean: 2. involving or affecting function rather than physiology;
3. relating to or based on function especially as opposed to structure;

sentences.sentence: "the problem now is not a constitutional one; it is a functional one"
"delegates elected on a functional rather than a geographical basis"

means.word_mean: 4. fit or ready for use or service;

sentences.sentence: "the toaster was still functional even after being dropped"
"the lawnmower is a bit rusty but still usable"
"the dishwasher is now in working order"

means.word_mean: 5. designed for or adapted to a function or use;

sentences.sentence: "functional education selects knowledge that is concrete and usable rather than abstract and theoretical"

means.word_mean: 6. (of e.g. a machine) performing or capable of performing;

Sentence.sentence: He stood out in three ways－as a technologist, as a corporate （公司的）leader and as somebody who was able to make people love what had previously been impersonal, functional gadgets.
He invented lots of functional gadgets

sentences.en: The furniture is not fancy, just functional.
sentences.cn: 这些家具不是摆着好看的, 只是为了实用。

means.word_mean: 能起作用的, 产生影响的

sentences.en: The telephone was out of order, but is functional now.
sentences.cn: 电话刚才坏了, 但现在可以用了。
